eitr2.name: Eitr
eitr2.title: Spring Sunrise
eitr2.description: Unquestioning servant of the ruler of nothingness, she lacks the confidence to express her own will. Yet, at Askr's spring festival, she comes to know of a new world.

Castle Hall: Such gatherings usually frighten me, but... It's so nice and warm here. It's very calming.
I was in a world where nothingness had spread far and wide. No hope, no future, no spring sunshine... Nothing.
Spring has arrived. I hope my brother is out there somewhere...enjoying the spring wherever he is.
This season is so bright... It's hard to believe such a world exists beyond the nightmares.
I wonder... If I'm dressed as a rabbit, does that mean I can run away faster if I get scared?
Visit: Is...someone there? I was told this spring-festival invitation is for you. It's from [F].
Level: My heart... It feels so warm. I believe I may come to enjoy the spring.
I cannot just yearn... I must extend my hand and take the strength that the spring dream has for me.
I'm sorry if I ruined the festival...
Summon: I am Eitr... Is it r-really OK if I join you in the spring festival?
Learn Skill: A gift...to celebrate spring? I will take good care of it. Thank you.
Confession:
【Summoner】
...
Thank you so much for inviting me to such a wonderful festival. Truly.
In my world there were no festivals. There was only cold and dark and a vast, endless nothingness...
But even in that empty world, I had faint memories of my brother. They were my one and only hope.
The spring air reminds me of him... Kind and warm...and soothing.
I want to stay in the spring sun just a little while longer...if that is OK.
Thank you so much. I won't forget this... The first festival where I could spend time in the sun...with everyone.
Status: Uh-huh.
Why would someone want me at a spring festival?
Ah! Stop it! Please! Don't pick on me...
Bunnies are cute. And everyone likes them. I wish I...
I-if I get embarrassed, I'll just hide behind the ears.
Spring changes so much. But I'm always the same. I do like the flowers though...
Oh Freyr. I miss you so much...
I feel so hopeless... Would it be all right if held your hand?

mae2.name: Mae
mae2.title: Spring Cheer
mae2.description: A mage who is well liked for her positivity and energy. She is Celica's close friend and strives to bring Askr's spring festival to life. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Castle Hall: While I'm here, I might as well use magic to bring this spring festival to life instead of using it to hurt people.
Novis is so pretty in springtime! The flowers all bloom at the same time, and the ocean shines brilliantly.
Ooh, spring is so exciting! It makes me feel all...hippety-hoppy.
Even though spring comes every year, it's never the same. Each time, it feels fresh and brings a new cheer!
Such a cute outfit! I wonder what Celica and Boey would say about it.
Visit: Hello there! I have a spring delivery for you from [F].
Level: It's not every day you have a spring festival. Let's hop around and enjoy it together!
Festivals are no time for sadness. They're a time to laugh in the warm sunlight... Come on!
Oh, uh...did I get too carried away? I might hear from Celica about this...
Summon: I'm Mae! I hear you're having a spring festival. I'll do my very best to make it lively and fun. Let's hop to it, 'K?
Learn Skill: For me, really?! Oh, yay! See, good things are bound to happen in the spring!
Confession:
Ahh... This is so much fun! I hope you're enjoying the spring festival too, [S].
No more cold, wintry days. Flowers are blooming, everyone is smiling... It's the best, don't you think?
I understand now why you want to protect the people of Askr, keep them smiling all day, every day.
And that's why I'm here—to lend you my strength so everyone is free to keep enjoying festivals like this.
And we want to keep having these festivals every year, of course. So, while I'm here...
We should enjoy the festival as long as it lasts. Come on! Hippety-hop! Spring is here!
Status: Whoa!
Aw, thanks for the invite. And such a cute outfit!
Whoa! *sigh* You startled me.
Ahh, spring... I can't help but be excited about this season.
Celica told me to have fun at the festival. So *giggle* that's what I'll do.
Novis is so pretty in springtime! Amazingly so!
I wonder what Boey would say if he saw me in this outfit... *laugh* That'd be silly!
Ugh, it's so warm out! Ha... Great outdoors, here we come!

plumeria4.name: Plumeria
plumeria4.title: Spring Dance
plumeria4.description: Plumeria, the dökkálfr, and Olivia, the dancer. Their dance brings color to the spring festival. They appear in Fire Emblem Heroes / Awakening
plumeria4.harmonized:
Grants【Resonance: Blades】to unit and allies from the same titles as unit for 1 turn.
If unit has not entered combat on the current turn, grants another action to unit, and if Canto has already been triggered, re-enables Canto.
(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the Harmonized button. This skill can only be used once per map. Harmonized Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.

Castle Hall: **Olivia:** Since we're dancing in pairs for the festival, I vow to do my best so I don't hold Plumeria back!
**Plumeria:** This is merely a spring dream... I must believe that if I am to tolerate the lascivious looks humans direct at me.
**Plumeria:** Considering how self-conscious she seems, Olivia's dancing is quite bold.
**Plumeria:** Eitr came to the spring festival too. I hope she can find the warmth she seeks in this world...
**Olivia:** Plumeria, look how wonderfully that outfit suits you! Oh... You don't like when people look at you?
Visit: I am Plumeria, the dökkálfr of lewd dreams. You are in an eternal dream of spring, [S].
Level: **Olivia:** I-I'm embarrassed, but as long as Plumeria is with me, I can do this!
**Olivia:** I always try to keep the spring winds at my back when I'm dancing.
**Plumeria:** Humans...how their gazes cling to me. Their attention is so vile, I cannot focus on dancing.
Summon: Olivia, is this where the festival is to take place? Why did I agree to this... demonstrating my dance to humans?
Learn Skill: **Olivia:** Plumeria, we're in perfect sync! Oops! W-well, I thought I'd give saying it a try...
Confession:
**Plumeria:** Olivia, what is it that inspired you to invite me to the spring festival?
**Olivia:** About that... To tell you the truth, from the first time I saw you, I felt...
Well...like I could perform the kind of dance that would make everyone smile if I did it alongside you!
**Plumeria:** I have no desire to entertain those vulgar creatures, so full of lust.
However, pathetic as they are, I can pity them enough to allow them a fleeting spring dream, I suppose.
**Olivia:** Um...yes! Let's make spring memories together that no one will forget! I'm certain I can do that with your help.
Status: Uh...
"Of all the possibilities, why call me here?" "It does look...fun, though, doesn't it?"
Conversation: **Olivia:** And for the grand finale... There! All finished!
**Plumeria:** Yes... And so our spectacle has reached its point of completion. Now disperse. All of you.
**Olivia:** *giggle* The crowd certainly seemed to enjoy our performance.
**Plumeria:** That's all well and good for them... Do you really not mind?
**Plumeria:** That they were all leering at us the entire time! It was obscene!
**Olivia:** Well... I know what it's like to get embarrassed when people stare, but...
**Plumeria:** Then you understand! They look straight through your clothes and imagine you without them!
**Olivia:** Even when I get flustered, I still want an audience when I'm performing... so I just try to set my nerves aside.
**Plumeria:** But...you're always shrieking, "Mm, don't look at me! How embarrassing!" So, which is it?
**Olivia:** It's just that...being looked at can be a little overwhelming sometimes, that's all.
**Plumeria:** So, you'd have it both ways, hm? *sigh* Typical mortal way of thinking.
**Olivia:** If you could think that way, maybe you wouldn't feel so uncomfortable around people!
**Plumeria:** Out of the question! That's just what they'd all love, I'm sure...
Not that anything I do turns them away—I call them out as the filth they are, and they clamor for more! Why?!
**Plumeria:** Indeed. As ever, mortals defy all comprehension.

veyle3.name: Veyle
veyle3.title: Spring Tranquility
veyle3.description: A dragon with a heart as warm as springtime. Her friends picked out her outfit for the festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: How strange. I dislike bright places, but I long for spring sunlight more than the dim illumination of candles.
I've always watched from afar. I never thought I would get to enjoy a festival for myself. I'm so excited!

Did the spring warmth cause you to oversleep? Sleeping for a long time is scary, isn't it?
But don't worry, I'll stay by you, even if you sleep for one hundred years.
I'm not good at drawing or painting... Hmm. Could I just dye my egg a color I like instead of drawing on it?
If I was born a rabbit, I wouldn't have experienced so many hard things, but I also wouldn't have met all of you.
Visit:
Did the rabbit ears surprise you? We are having a spring festival where I just came from!
Here! This festive greeting is for you, from [F].
Level: Wh-what do I do? I'm so happy, my ears are bouncing.
When you're at a festival, things that normally brighten your day a bit can have an even greater impact, huh?
Sorry. I know it's a festival and all... I'll be more careful!
Summon: I'm Veyle. I'm a dragon. I hear there's going to be a spring festival. Can I be of use in some way?
Learn Skill: Thank you. The festival is going to be even more fun now!
Confession:
Hello, Summoner. Thank you for being there for me. I can't help but await your return when we're apart.
Why do you keep me with you? Oh, maybe you like bunnies? That's not it? Then, do you enjoy my company?
N-no, forget I said that! I shouldn't be so silly. It's because you have some greater strategy in mind, isn't it?
It doesn't matter. I'm just glad I got to make some memories with you this spring that I can treasure.
When the spring festival comes again, remember your friend with the long bunny ears. Let's talk more soon.
Status: I can't believe I'm really at a festival! It's like a dream... A dream with an adorable outfit!
I probably look strange, a Fell Dragon with rabbit ears... Really? You think they suit me?
I'm seeing lots of people in rabbit outfits. Do you think they'll want to be friends with me?
*yawn* With all this sunshine, I could almost use a nap. But no! I will not sleep through the festival!
Do you need help carrying anything? Your flowers or chocolate eggs, perhaps?
Papa would never, ever go to a festival like this. Well, except to burn everything down.
I hope you won't mind me asking, but... Oh, come on, Veyle! Summoner, would you like to walk around the festival together?

lonqu2.name: Lon'qu
lonqu2.title: Spring Jitters
lonqu2.description: A skilled swordsman of Regna Ferox who is oddly skittish around women. He shows some hesitancy toward Askr's spring festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

Castle Hall: The spring air is so clear... I wonder if its warmth could heal the scars of my past.
I am a swordsman, yet as hard as it is to believe, even I have a part to play in this festival.
I freeze whenever a woman approaches. This is a festival, and yet... How pathetic.
I cannot rest, nor can I concern myself with spring merriment. I must always train.
What do I think of this outfit? When Basilio gave it to me, I believed he had lost his mind. That is all.
Visit:
Ah! I have a delivery for you from [F].
And please do not ask me about what I'm wearing.
Level:
Spring is here!
I...was told to say that.
I will not hold back, no matter how ridiculous I look.
Are you suggesting I got lost in the... festive atmosphere?
Summon: I am Lon'qu, swordsman of Regna Ferox. Now, explain why I've been called to this festival. Spare no detail.
Learn Skill: I'm beginning to understand why Basilio sent me to this festival...
Confession:
I am grateful you invited me to the spring festival. I have overcome my discomfort around women at last...
That is what you'd like me to say, isn't it? Well, it is not true.
Be honest—why summon me to such an absurd festival?!
I need to train, and I need to fight. I do not have time for this uniquely embarrassing nonsense.
This outfit... The ears are restrictive beyond measure, and the time it took to put it on... Wait.
Is this, too, part of my training? Did Basilio foresee all of this when he involved me?
Status: Hm.
Festive clothes for a festive occasion... But I'm not very festive.
Hm? I understand it's a festival, but don't get carried away.
It's just the season changing. Why is everybody so excited?
I dream of mastering the blade, no matter what other weapons I add to my arsenal.
Don't be careless. The warmth can...make you sleepy.
Asleep? Me? Uh... Don't be a fool.
Do not worry about me. Please enjoy yourself.
